parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.21

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns marker color for given marker.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is identical to [[markerColor]].</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getMarkerColor]] markerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]] - marker name

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"MarkerOne" [[setMarkerColor]] "ColorBlack";
_color = [[getMarkerColor]] "MarkerOne"; <template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// returns "ColorBlack"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerColor]], [[setMarkerColorLocal]]
</value></part></template>
